original_text: And when we had accomplished those days, we departed and went our way; and they all brought us on our way, with wives and children, till we were out of the city: and we kneeled down on the shore, and prayed.
korean_text: 이 여러 날을 지낸 후 우리가 떠나갈새 그들이 다 그 처자와 함께 성문 밖까지 전송하거늘 우리가 바닷가에서 무릎을 꿇어 기도하고

sentences.original_text: And when we had accomplished those days
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 우리가 그 날들을 마쳤을 때

sentences.original_text: and they all brought us on our way
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들이 모두 우리를 길까지 배웅했고

sentences.original_text: till we were out of the city
and we kneeled down on the shore
